title: Bug 5340 - Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
description: When attempting to add an exception breakpoint and then cancelling the operation, the breakpoint is still added. This presents a problem as it is expected that cancelling the operation would prevent the breakpoint from being added.
OB:
1) In the debug perspective, go to the breakpoints pane. 
2) Click the J! button to add an exception breakpoint.
EB:
3) In the progress dialog box, click the 'Cancel' button. 

Expected Behaviour: Cancelling the operation should prevent the exception breakpoint from being added.
SR: The issue should be fixed so that cancelling the operation actually prevents the exception breakpoint from being added.
